execution_quality: Agent appears to have provided minimal response; the user's follow-up refinement ('no, I think...') suggests the agent may have mischaracterized or incompletely understood the observed behavior.
work_category: System behavior observation and refinement - user reporting findings from testing a configuration change and refining their understanding of the behavior.
summary: User was conducting observational testing of the 'on' setting's behavior and refined their initial finding in a follow-up, but the agent's response appears to have missed or misrepresented the nuance. This represents ongoing collaborative debugging where the agent hasn't yet captured the full picture of the behavior.
follow_up_pattern: User corrected or refined their initial observation, indicating iterative debugging of mouse/screen behavior related to the setting change.
